entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
